title: Daiji na Koto nanode, Nido.
original_name: 大事なことなので、二度。
sinopse:
1. Daiji na Koto nanode, Nido. (Because This Is the Most Important Thing.)
2. Baka to Iwarete Nido, Sando. (Call Me a Fool Once, Twice, Thrice.)
3. Hontou ni Daiji na Koto wa, Ichido dake. (One in a Million.)
4. Suki Doushi nara Nandodemo. (Love Only Counts If It's Mutual.)
5. Shachou no Kakushigoto (Boss's Little Secret)
6. Yorokobu Kotoba wo Nandodemo. (Happiest Are the Words Said Lovingly.)
